chapter.text: You walk inside and turn the corner. ^1500You see the same view you saw from the door. ^1500You walk inside and turn again. ^1500The room repeats. ^1500With every turn, the room extends. ^1500You begin to notice the room getting darker with every turn. ^1500You stop for a moment. ^1500You spin around and run back the way you came. ^1500With each passing room, you begin to worry that thereâ€™s no way out, then run headfirst into the door you entered from.
